question: A cistern can be filled by pipe P in 3 hours and pipe Q in 5 hours and empty by pipe R in 2 hours. If all these pipes are open, then in how many hours the cistern will be full?
explanation:
Because as per the question part of the cistern filled by all pipes in an hour $latex = \\frac{1}{3}+\\frac{1}{5}-\\frac{1}{2}=\\frac{10+6-15}{30}=\\frac{1}{30}&s=1$
So, the cistern will be filled in 30 hours if all pipes are open. 
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
